name: DNS-RPZ
author: Michael Hornung; Expeditors International of Washington, Inc.
description: Add a dynamic DNS entry to a Response Policy Zone, blackholing or redirecting a FQDN.

configurationItems.name: bind_server
configurationItems.description: IP or FQDN of RPZ master BIND server

configurationItems.name: tsig_keyname
configurationItems.description: Name of TSIG key to access BIND server

configurationItems.name: tsig_keyval
configurationItems.description: TSIG key value to access BIND server

configurationItems.name: rpz_zonename
configurationItems.description: Fully qualified RPZ zone name (don't forget the trailing dot)

configurationItems.name: remediation_ip
configurationItems.description: IP to resolve RPZ names to
